page.title: 07SKELMERSDALE FUN DAY
page.content: On Sunday September 15th 1985 the {National Society for the Prevention of {Cruelty to Children}held a County Fun Day at Dalton Cricket Ground,Ashurst Beacon. Lots of people attended and many seemed to go to the fair.The fair had a bouncing castle.There were lots of side stalls and games including Roll-a-Penny,Lucky-Dip and Treasure Hunt. There was a{Car Boot Sale}in the morning and acrobatics later on. The main events were the 5km and 10km{Fun {Runs.}Lots of people enjoy{jogging}at the moment so there were lots of entries. Everybody who finished the race was awarded a medal but the real idea was for each runner to get sponsored by lots of people and to give this money to charity.
